name: Rogue2048
description:
Movement

- You play the colored units

- Click on a unit to move it (and all other units)

- Each unit has its own movement options

- Moving two friendly units of the same time onto each other merges them into one stronger unit

- Enemy units broadcast their movement (red squares)

- Enemy units move after you have moved

- Moving into a hostile unit triggers a fight

Fighting

- When two units fight, the stronger unit always wins, destroying the weaker unit

- If both units are equal, both are destroyed

- If the attacker is the weaker unit, it is destroyed but als reduces the defender's unit type by one

Winning

- Destroy all enemy units to enter the next level

- OR Move all friendly units to exit tiles

- Friendly units alive at the end of the level are taken into the next level.
